function.name: get_current_time
function.description: Get the current time in a given location

location.description: The location name. The pytz is used to get the timezone for that location. Location names should be in a format like America/New_York, Asia/Bangkok, Europe/London

function.name: get_current_weather
function.description: Get the current weather in a given location

location.description: The city name, e.g. San Francisco
